column4: Hi, i have added repository  ftp://ftp.nerim.net/debian-marillat/  but synaptic can't connect!
is that repository down? or i am configuring it badly?

To allow FTP through IPTABLES, it is enough to open source and destination ports 20 and 21, right? i cannot access to ftp repositories debian-marillat with synaptic and i guess it is an iptables bad configuration ...
no, it's not. Firewalling FTP is a pita.
